title: Fps drop patch 7.1
body:
So i patched to 7.1 and all normal, after couple of days i started noticing that my game freezes for milisecond and my frame drops from 200-250 to 100-150, and then suddenly nothing happens and my frame drops from 100 to 30-40 and stays like that for about 30 secs and that happends couple times while I am playing
I have FX 6100 and RX460 4gb and i feel like this is not supposed to happend, i reinstalled game and i also had alloth of errors while trying to patch again I fixed it and patched, but frame drops are still happening, checked my drivers they are all up to date, did everyting in league fps troubleshooting article, even set everything at low, and still nothing.
So please if u can help me, and sorry if I have bad english it is not my first language.

replies.body: same i can play most of the newer games on max settings but league oh god this patch. id run around 200 fps+ and now im at 60-30. idk whats happening but holy sh*t this is so bad on who ever made this patch.

Normally fps issues can happen from bad files or outdated drivers, which sounds like you've troubleshooted already through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help individually and find what's going on.  

Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well go obtain logs and attach it to your ticket to give our tech team more context.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.

I too have been having this issue and tried everything in the FPS guide but to no avail. I am hoping this issue gets resolved upon warwick's release patch, so that i can at least play rank some more. I have had to stop playing the game due to being uncomfortable possibly ruining rank games for teammates since i would be at an unfair disadvantage with the crazy random fps drops.
